contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Arendonk,Belgium |picture= |picture-legend= |map=ArendonkLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Arendonk in the province of Antwerp |arms=Blason Arendonk.svg |flag=Arendonk_Flag.jpg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-AN}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Turnhout|Turnhout]] |nis=13001 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Nest Buijs ([[CD&V]]) |majority=[[CD&V]], [[sp.a]] |postal-codes=2370 |telephone-area=014 |web=[http://www.arendonk.be www.arendonk.be] |lat_deg=51 |lat_min=19 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=05 }} {{listen |filename=Telowerele-er.ogg |title=Telowerelè-er |description= Dialect spoken nickname of an Arendonk inhabitant |format=[[Ogg]]}} '''Arendonk''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Antwerp (province)|Antwerp]]. The municipality comprises only the town of Arendonk proper. On January 1, 2006 Arendonk had a total population of 12,215. The total area is 55.38 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 221 inhabitants per km². ==Nickname== The nickname for a person living in Arendonk is "Telowerelè'er" meaning dish-licker. A statue personating the nickname is located in proximity of the Toremansmolen, another attraction. The mill is still operational and can be visited regularly. The major of this big city is called Thomas Verheyden. ==Famous inhabitants== * [[Rik Van Steenbergen]], thrice [[UCI World Championships|World Cycling Champion]] * [[Karel Meulemans]], one of the best [[pigeon keeping|pigeonfanciers]] worldwide ==Arendonk images== <gallery> Image:Arendonk Centrum Kerk OLV LR.jpg| OLV Church Arendonk Image:RikVanSteenbergenTorso.jpg| Rik Van Steenbergen Image:Telowerelèer molen LR.jpg | Telowerelè'er and Toremansmolen Image:Academie LR.jpg |Arendonks Academy of art located in a former cigar factory of "Karel I sigaren" </gallery> ==See also== * [[Ravago]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.arendonk.be Official website] - Available only in [[Dutch language|Dutch]] {{Antwerpen_Belgium}} [[Category:Municipalities of Antwerp (province)]] {{Antwerp-geo-stub}}
